player_information.key_achievements: PFWA All-Rookie Team (2018), Second-team All-Pro (2020), College National Championships (2015, 2017), Led NFL in air yards (1,849) in 2024
player_information.performance_goals: Establishing consistent chemistry with rookie QB Cam Ward, returning to elite WR1 production, and helping the Titans compete in the AFC South

team_information.team_strategy: Rebuilding around rookie quarterback Cam Ward and establishing a competitive offense
team_information.team_success: 3-14 record in 2024 season, 4th place in AFC South division

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: receptions, receiving yards, touchdowns, target share, air yards, and team offensive production

coaching_management.player_coach_relationship: Working with new coaching staff under Brian Callahan

ownership_information.championship_success: No recent playoff success, rebuilding phase
ownership_information.business_priorities: Team rebuilding and establishing competitive foundation
